markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Girtablilu Sentry](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1170)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Sentries patrol the outskirts of a girtablilu communities, watching for external threats like [desert drakes](/Monsters.aspx?ID=164), [blue dragons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=166), or adventuring parties set on reckless exploration of the girtablilus' sacred site.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Girtablilu Sentry](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1170)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 112</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Girtablilu](/Languages.aspx?ID=64)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 160

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longspear_ +21 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pincer +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +20 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 piercing plus girtablilu venom

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  2d8+6 bludgeoning, DC 24

**Desert Stride**   A girtablilu ignores natural difficult terrain in the desert.

**Girtablilu Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 24 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); **Stage 3** 3d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-239" />
name: Girtablilu Sentry
